flavorText: As Ulamog's brood reduces the earth to dust, geopedes burst from their tunnels in search of solid ground.

foreignData.flavorText: Während Ulamogs Brut das Erdreich zu Staub verwandelt, brechen die Geopeden aus ihren Tunneln hervor, auf der Suche nach festem Untergrund.
foreignData.name: Tunnelgräber-Geoped
foreignData.text: Landung — Immer wenn ein Land unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, fügt der Tunnelgräber-Geoped jedem Gegner 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

foreignData.flavorText: Mientras la estirpe de Ulamog reduce la tierra a polvo, los geópodos brotan de los túneles en busca de terrenos más sólidos.
foreignData.name: Geópodo excavador
foreignData.text: Aterrizaje — Siempre que una tierra entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, el Geópodo excavador hace 1 punto de daño a cada oponente.

foreignData.flavorText: Tandis que la progéniture d'Ulamog réduit la terre en poussière, les géopèdes jaillissent de leurs tunnels en quête d'un sol solide.
foreignData.name: Géopède tunnelier
foreignData.text: Toucheterre — À chaque fois qu'un terrain arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, le Géopède tunnelier inflige 1 blessure à chaque adversaire.

foreignData.flavorText: Man mano che la covata di Ulamog riduce la terra in polvere, i geopiedi emergono dai loro tunnel alla ricerca di terreno solido.
foreignData.name: Geopiede Scavatore
foreignData.text: Terraferma — Ogniqualvolta una terra entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, il Geopiede Scavatore infligge 1 danno a ogni avversario.

foreignData.flavorText: ウラモグの血統が大地を塵に変えると、堅い土地を求めて土百足が巣穴から出てくる。
foreignData.name: 穴掘り土百足
foreignData.text: 上陸 ― 土地が１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、穴掘り土百足は各対戦相手にそれぞれ１点のダメージを与える。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 昆虫

foreignData.flavorText: 울라목의 군락이 대지를 먼지로 만들어 버리자 단단한 땅을 찾기 위해 땅지네가 굴에서 솟구쳐 나왔다.
foreignData.name: 굴파는 땅지네
foreignData.text: 대지력 — 대지가 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 굴파는 땅지네는 각 상대에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.

foreignData.flavorText: À medida que a linhagem de Ulamog reduz a terra a pó, os geopedes irrompem de seus túneis em busca de chão sólido.
foreignData.name: Geopede Tunelador
foreignData.text: Aterragem — Toda vez que um terreno entra no campo de batalha sob seu controle, Geopede Tunelador causa 1 ponto de dano a cada oponente.

foreignData.flavorText: Выводок Уламога превращал землю в прах, и земленожкам пришлось покинуть свои тоннели в поисках твердой почвы.
foreignData.name: Норная Земленожка
foreignData.text: Землепад — Каждый раз, когда земля выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, Норная Земленожка наносит 1 повреждение каждому оппоненту.

foreignData.flavorText: 钨拉莫孳生的巢群把大地碎作尘土，逼得地蜈蚣从地道中涌出寻找坚实的土地。
foreignData.name: 掘隧地蜈蚣
foreignData.text: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，掘隧地蜈蚣向每位对手各造成1点伤害。

foreignData.flavorText: 鎢拉莫孳生的巢群把大地碎作塵土，逼得地蜈蚣從地道中湧出尋找堅實的土地。
foreignData.name: 掘隧地蜈蚣
foreignData.text: 地落～每當一個地在你的操控下進戰場時，掘隧地蜈蚣向每位對手各造成1點傷害。

name: Tunneling Geopede
originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Tunneling Geopede deals 1 damage to each opponent.

rulings.text: A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.

When a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

If the ability has an additional or replacement effect that depends on the land having a certain basic land type, the ability will check that land’s type as the ability resolves. If, at that time, the land that entered the battlefield is no longer on the battlefield, use its types when it left the battlefield to determine what happens.

text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Tunneling Geopede deals 1 damage to each opponent.
